title.narrative: Capacity Building of the Regional Government of Madre de Dios to handle and solve the problems of informal artisanal and small scale mining

description.narrative: Regional Government of Madre de Dios GOREMAD needs capacitation in administering and coordinating the local mining activities including the fast expanding informal small scale and artisanal mining. While brining livelihood to local population they also ca use several negative impacts on biodiversity protected areas landscapes waters as well as confilcts with different economic actiities like forestry agriculture and tourism. Social and health problems incl. human trafficking and mercury polluted waters are apparent. GOREMAD and its energy and mining directorate DREMH need capacity building and training to develop more efficient methods and management tools for control and various permits as well as to use cleaner and more efficient techonlogies of processing and extraction of gold. gain tools for assessment on environmental and social impacts and finally to improve the cooperation between various authorities in the mining sector as well as with the neighboring areas in Bolivia and Brazil. Project implementing parties are Geological Survey of Finland GTK and Regional Government of Madre de Dios and its Directorate of Energy and Mining. Implementing period is 1 January 2013 to 30 June 2015 and project budget is 400 000 Euros.
